title: HW7 Q4: Read a Blog Post: How to train your Resnet

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Problem context:</paragraph><paragraph>In reality, the field of deep learning is rapidly evolving. You're going to have to be continually learning and leaning on online resources to do so. We wanted to make sure that everyone has the skills required to take advantage of such resources, and so in this problem have assigned you reading of a blog series so that you can be supported by course staff if you find yourself having any issues with understanding how to read such things. In later HW, we will also assign a paper to read and this is also an important part of the project.</paragraph></document>
comments.document:
Problem context:

In reality, the field of deep learning is rapidly evolving. You're going to have to be continually learning and leaning on online resources to do so. We wanted to make sure that everyone has the skills required to take advantage of such resources, and so in this problem have assigned you reading of a blog series so that you can be supported by course staff if you find yourself having any issues with understanding how to read such things. In later HW, we will also assign a paper to read and this is also an important part of the project.
